question: Which global financial institution is to invest $100 million equivalent in the Fund of Funds of National Investment and Infrastructure Fund (NIIF)?
explanation:
Manila-based Asian Development Bank (ADB) is to invest $100 million equivalent in the National Investment and Infrastructure Fund-NIIFâ€™s Fund of Funds.
